comments.body: These could be combined into a single file unless you really want them to be separate.

Intentionally separate files and commits because I wasn't sure if the new Solaris fallback was backportable to 2.11 or not. It's "kind of" a feature, allowing the "new" way to set ACLs on tmpdirs? But also kind of a bug fix?

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +0,4 @@bugfixes:
  - become - work around setfacl not existing on modern Solaris (and possibly failing on some filesystems even when it does exist)
